title: 1999/756/EC: Council Decision of 15 November 1999 appointing a German member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 15 November 1999
appointing a German member of the Committee of the Regions
(1999/756/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 26 January 1998(1) appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions,
Whereas a seat as a member of the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Otto Kretschmer, a German member, notified to the Council on 9 November 1999,
Having regard to the proposal from the German Government,
main_body: Mr JĂźrgen Gnauck is hereby appointed a member of the Committee of the Regions in place of Mr Otto Kretschmer for the remainder of his term of office, which runs until 25 January 2002.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 November 1999.
For the Council
The President
T. HALONEN
(1) OJ L 28, 4.2.1998, p. 19.
